author: Melissa Harrison
title: 21 Instant Pot Dinner Ideas

organizations.name: instant pot golden lentil & spinach soup view

text:
View this image ›
ID: 10475320 1. Instant Pot Beef Stew number-2-pencil.com
 Using the sauté function, you’ll sear the meat directly in the pot. Then just toss in the vegetables and stock — and pressure cook everything for 20 minutes. Recipe here.
ID: 10434580 2. Instant Pot Golden Lentil & Spinach Soup View this image ›
kitchentreaty.com Vegetarian and vegan-friendly — and cooks up in all of 12 minutes. Recipe here .
ID: 10434810 3. Crispy Chicken Carnitas littlespicejar.com
 The secret to getting the shredded chicken extra crispy? Tossing it in the broiler for a few minutes before serving. Recipe here .
ID: 10467661 4. Instant Pot Red Beans & Rice apinchofhealthy.com
 The red bean mixture freezes really well, so feel free to make a double batch. Recipe here.
ID: 10434773 5. Pressure Cooker Spaghetti Sauce View this image ›
J. Kenji López-Alt / seriouseats.com All the flavor of a classic all-day sauce in a fraction of the time. Recipe here.
ID: 10467708 6. Teriyaki Turkey Meatballs mommyshomecooking.com
 This version uses ground turkey, but you could also swap in ground chicken or beef. Recipe here.
ID: 10467552 7. Pressure Cooker Faux Pho thesophisticatedcaveman.com
 Ready? Say it three times fast: fauxphofauxphofauxpho. Recipe here .
ID: 10434877 8. Vegan Black Bean Soup View this image ›
apinchofhealthy.com Topped with fresh avocado. Recipe here.
ID: 10434665 9. Instant Pot Faux-tisserie Chicken View this image ›
cookingwithcurls.com Moment of silence for all that the rotisserie chicken has given us. Recipe here.
ID: 10434634 10. Slow Cooker Tortellini Soup with Sausage & Kale View this image ›
foodiecrush.com The soup simmers low and slow for four hours, then the tortellini is dropped in near the end so it doesn’t overcook. Recipe here.
ID: 10434891 11. Instant Pot Beef Gyros mycrazygoodlife.com
 Serve the meat stuffed into pitas, over rice, or on its own. Recipe here.
ID: 10434693 12. Vegan Chickpea Curry View this image ›
chefdehome.com Packed with protein. Recipe here .
ID: 10434946 13. 5-Ingredient Cheesy Egg Bake kitschencat.com
 Breakfast for dinner? I’m in. Recipe here.
ID: 10467567 14. Copycat Chipotle Barbacoa View this image ›
jaysbakingmecrazy.com In true Chipotle style, serve this over cilantro rice or wrapped in a tortilla. Recipe here.
ID: 10467577 15. Spaghetti Squash aggieskitchen.com
 Spaghetti squash can take forever in the oven, but with this method, it’s ready to go in about 10 minutes. Recipe here.
ID: 10467741 16. Coconut Lime Quinoa unsophisticook.com
 You’ll make this using the rice cooker function. Before serving, just top with your favorite meat or veggies. Recipe here .
ID: 10434867 17. Buffalo Chicken Meatballs whatgreatgrandmaate.com
 All the flavor of buffalo wings with way less mess. Recipe here.
ID: 10434943 18. Instant Pot Shepherd’s Pie View this image ›
thispilgrimlife.com This version cooks everything in two parts — first you’ll cook the potatoes until they’re mashable. Then you’ll toss in the meat and vegetables. Recipe here.
ID: 10467667 19. French Dip Sandwiches slowcookergourmet.net
 This makes enough for eight servings, and includes both slow cooker and pressure cooker instructions. Recipe here.
ID: 10434712 20. Lentil & Sausage Soup View this image ›
lemon.press Packed with fresh vegetables. Recipe here.
ID: 10467554 21. Instant Pot Wendy’s Copycat Chili View this image ›
anightowlblog.com Hearty, filling, and perfect for winter. Recipe here.
ID: 10467674
